entry.title: WHO AM I
entry.summary: Your time is limited, So don't waste it living someone else's…
entry.content:
Your time is limited, So don't waste it living someone else's life;

Don't let noice of other's opinion drown down your own inner voice;

Have the courage to follow your heart and Intuition, They somehow already know what you truely want to become;

Everything else is secondary

- Steve jobs

The quote in which I firmly believe
That's the reason, I am obsessed with working on my own projects.
Curious about usual and unusual stuff.
Great with understanding psychology.
I love applying different approach to things.
At the core, I am passionate about Computers and mend to meliorate better.
Feel free to reach out if you need emotional support, advice, person to work on projects, we can get it done together

entry.title: WINMOD
entry.summary: WINMOD VERSION FILE NAME BIT SIZE FILE SIZE LIVE / INSTALLABLE…
entry.content:
Â 

WINMOD
VERSION FILE NAME BIT SIZE FILE SIZE LIVE / INSTALLABLE DETAILS TELEGRAM MEGA
2004.0.1.1.0.5 WINX86LITE1 32BIT 2.2GB INSTALLABLE COMPRESSED AFTER REMOVING WINDOWS APPS, SYSTEM APPS,INTERNET EXPLORER, SECURITY SERVICES, CORTANA, ONEDRIVE, MEDIA APPLICATIONS AND SOME EXTRA FEATURES LINK LINK
2004.0.0.1.0.4 WINX32LITE1 32BIT 2.7GB INSTALLABLE REMOVED WINDOWS APPS, SYSTEM APPS,INTERNET EXPLORER, SECURITY SERVICES, CORTANA, ONEDRIVE, MEDIA APPLICATIONS AND SOME EXTRA FEATURES LINK LINK
2004.0.1.1.0.3 WINX86LITE 32BIT 2.3GB INSTALLABLE COMPRESSED AFTER REMOVING WINDOWS APPS AND SOME EXTRA FEATURES LINK LINK
2004.0.0.1.0.2 WINX32LITE 32BIT 3.5GB INSTALLABLE REMOVED WINDOWS APPS AND SOME EXTRA FEATURES LINK LINK
2004.1.0.1.0.1 BETA1 64BIT 5.3GB INSTALLABLE REMOVED WINDOWS APPS AND SOME EXTRA FEATURES LINK LINK



HOW VERSIONING IS DONE OVER HERE

2004 . 1 . 0 . 1 . 0 . 1
SOURCE VERSION . BIT . COMPRESSION TYPE . COMPOSITION TYPE . USAGE TYPE . SERIAL NUMBER

SOURCE VERSION - FIRST TWO NUMBERS REPRESENT YEAR AND SECOND TWO REPRESENT MONTH
BIT - 32 : 0 , 64 : 1
COMPRESSION TYPE - WIM : 0 , ESD : 1
COMPOSITION TYPE - NORMAL : 0 , LITE : 1 , FULL : 2 , EXTRA : 3
USAGE TYPE - INSTALLABLE : 0 , LIVE : 1
SERIAL NUMBER - STARTS FROM 1
